reference.title: cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation
reference.shortdesc: Contains child elements specifying the location a typedef in the source code..

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation> element is defined within <cxxTypedefDefinition>. The <cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation> element must contain the location of the API declaration using <cxxTypedefDeclarationFile> and <cxxTypedefDeclarationFileLine>.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation> <cxxTypedefDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="D:/src/include/headerfile.h"/> <cxxTypedefDeclarationFileLine name="lineNumber" value="775"/> <cxxTypedefDefinitionFile name="filePath" value="D:/src/include/headerfile.h"/> </cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation>
